title: BTS Announces Big World Tour After Four Years
summary: BTS, a popular K-pop band, has announced a huge world tour with 79 shows after not performing for four years. They will play in many countries like South Korea, the UK, Japan, Germany, Australia, and the USA, starting in April 2026. The tour includes special stages that let more fans see them. Tickets go on sale in January. This tour is expected to be very successful and could make a lot of money, over $1 billion, from concerts and other things like merchandise. BTS became famous worldwide for their music and dance, and fans are excited because all members have finished their military service. Their last tour earned $246 million, and this one might be even bigger.

background_read: BTS is a K-pop band from South Korea that started in the early 2010s. They became very popular around the world with their music and dance. K-pop stands for Korean pop music, which often includes singing, dancing, and colorful performances. BTS took a break for four years, during which the members served in the military, a requirement in South Korea. Now they are returning with a big tour that fans have been waiting for. Tours like this help bands connect with fans and earn money from shows and merchandise.
